author: Reuters
title: Dollarama sees sales surge on stockpiling, suspends fiscal 2021 forecast
description: Dollarama said sales rose in the first few weeks of the current quarter, but that was followed by lower traffic after Canadians were told to stay home
content:
Canadian dollar-store operator Dollarama Inc. said it had seen a surge in current-quarter sales as consumers stocked up on everyday essentials fearing lockdowns due to the coronavirus pandemic, but suspended its current fiscal-year forecast.
